author: bayard
msg: Adding a retired page for Jakarta Taglibs. The Tomcat side of things is not live yet, plus there will be some
htaccess work to setup, so while this page will be viewable public it won't be hooked up to any of the Jakarta pages yet.

author: hiranya
msg: Changing Axis2 and AXIOM versions to SNAPSHOT and 1.2.9-SNAPSHOT respectively. Some minor code changes were done to cope up with the Axis2 clustering API changes that were done recently in Axis2 trunk. Kudos to Azeez for helping me out with these clustering code changes.
